overview: Marco Neumann is an Information Scientist and the CEO & Founder of KONA, an Information Consulting and Semantic Technology Company based in New York City. KONA provides knowledge organization and network analysis services and technologies to the emerging Semantic Technology market. KONA is a founding member of SeMuSe and a member of the CIDOC CRM Special Interest Group. Marco has worked with Semantic Web technologies for web-based data management in collaboration with media, technology and research organizations since 2000. His current interests are: distributed information syndication, contexts for the Semantic Web, and dynamic schema evolution in structured data. Marco is also the organizer of the New York and San Francisco Semantic Web Meetup, a community of interest composed of professionals, like-minded researchers and entrepreneurs in the metropolitan area.
